text: Tarapara yadi se strike (trtiyabara) talaka deya haya, tabe se stri ye paryanta take chara apara kona sbamira sathe biye kare na nebe, tara jan'ya halala naya. Atahpara yadi dbitiya sbami talaka diye deya, tahale tadera ubhayera jan'ya'i parasparake punaraya biye karate kona papa ne'i. Yadi allahara hukuma bajaya rakhara iccha thake.
